title: Holy Water
desc:
Post 1778
- Choose a player.
- If their hand has any card of evil origin (having at least one color out of <:grave:1119394182310670366>, <:bones:1118750770133737565>, <:void:1119855990263775283>, <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899>, <:monopoly:1171651746762866799>, or <:gloom:1187518684143550605>), that player gets **Destroyed**.
- Otherwise, they get to discard a card of their choosing.
